newsitem.title: UK: GEC rift delays search for chairman - Times.
newsitem.headline: GEC rift delays search for chairman - Times.

text.p: A boardroom rift at British electronics and engineering group General Electric Co Plc (GEC) is delaying the appointment of a successor to chairman Jim Prior, the Times newspaper said.
In its Friday edition, the Times said former deputy prime minister Michael Heseltine had been proposed but GEC chief executive George Simpson was against his appointment.
GEC said on Thursday that Prior would retire at the end of the current financial year in March and that the procedure to appoint a new chairman was under way.
